parameters.name: apiId
parameters.description: The API ID for the GraphQL API for the DataSource.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A user-supplied name for the DataSource.

parameters.name: dynamodbConfig
parameters.description: Amazon DynamoDB settings. The table name. The Amazon Web Services Region. useCallerCredentials (boolean) --- Set to TRUE to use Amazon Cognito credentials with this data source. deltaSyncConfig (dict) --- The DeltaSyncConfig for a versioned data source. baseTableTTL (integer) --- The number of minutes that an Item is stored in the data source. deltaSyncTableName (string) --- The Delta Sync table name. deltaSyncTableTTL (integer) --- The number of minutes that a Delta Sync log entry is stored in the Delta Sync table. versioned (boolean) --- Set to TRUE to use Conflict Detection and Resolution with this data source.

nested_params.name: tableName
nested_params.description: The table name.

nested_params.name: awsRegion
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_params.name: useCallerCredentials
nested_params.description: Set to TRUE to use Amazon Cognito credentials with this data source.

nested_params.name: deltaSyncConfig
nested_params.description: The DeltaSyncConfig for a versioned data source.

nested_params.name: baseTableTTL
nested_params.description: The number of minutes that an Item is stored in the data source.

nested_params.name: deltaSyncTableName
nested_params.description: The Delta Sync table name.

nested_params.name: deltaSyncTableTTL
nested_params.description: The number of minutes that a Delta Sync log entry is stored in the Delta Sync table.

nested_params.name: versioned
nested_params.description: Set to TRUE to use Conflict Detection and Resolution with this data source.

parameters.name: lambdaConfig
parameters.description: Lambda settings. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function.

nested_params.name: lambdaFunctionArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function.

parameters.name: elasticsearchConfig
parameters.description: Amazon OpenSearch Service settings. As of September 2021, Amazon Elasticsearch service is Amazon OpenSearch Service. This configuration is deprecated. For new data sources, use  CreateDataSourceRequest$openSearchServiceConfig to create an OpenSearch data source. The endpoint. The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_params.name: endpoint
nested_params.description: The endpoint.

nested_params.name: awsRegion
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: openSearchServiceConfig
parameters.description: Amazon OpenSearch Service settings. The endpoint. The Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_params.name: endpoint
nested_params.description: The endpoint.

nested_params.name: awsRegion
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: httpConfig
parameters.description: HTTP endpoint settings. endpoint (string) --- The HTTP URL endpoint. You can specify either the domain name or IP, and port combination, and the URL scheme must be HTTP or HTTPS. If you don't specify the port, AppSync uses the default port 80 for the HTTP endpoint and port 443 for HTTPS endpoints. authorizationConfig (dict) --- The authorization configuration in case the HTTP endpoint requires authorization. The authorization type that the HTTP endpoint requires. AWS_IAM: The authorization type is Signature Version 4 (SigV4). awsIamConfig (dict) --- The Identity and Access Management (IAM) settings. signingRegion (string) --- The signing Amazon Web Services Region for IAM authorization. signingServiceName (string) --- The signing service name for IAM authorization.

nested_params.name: endpoint
nested_params.description: The HTTP URL endpoint. You can specify either the domain name or IP, and port combination, and the URL scheme must be HTTP or HTTPS. If you don't specify the port, AppSync uses the default port 80 for the HTTP endpoint and port 443 for HTTPS endpoints.

nested_params.name: authorizationConfig
nested_params.description: The authorization configuration in case the HTTP endpoint requires authorization.

nested_params.name: authorizationType
nested_params.description: The authorization type that the HTTP endpoint requires.

nested_params.name: awsIamConfig
nested_params.description: The Identity and Access Management (IAM) settings.

nested_params.name: signingRegion
nested_params.description: The signing Amazon Web Services Region for IAM authorization.

nested_params.name: signingServiceName
nested_params.description: The signing service name for IAM authorization.

parameters.name: relationalDatabaseConfig
parameters.description: Relational database settings. relationalDatabaseSourceType (string) --- Source type for the relational database. RDS_HTTP_ENDPOINT: The relational database source type is an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) HTTP endpoint. rdsHttpEndpointConfig (dict) --- Amazon RDS HTTP endpoint settings. awsRegion (string) --- Amazon Web Services Region for Amazon RDS HTTP endpoint. dbClusterIdentifier (string) --- Amazon RDS cluster Amazon Resource Name (ARN). databaseName (string) --- Logical database name. schema (string) --- Logical schema name. awsSecretStoreArn (string) --- Amazon Web Services secret store Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for database credentials.

nested_params.name: relationalDatabaseSourceType
nested_params.description: Source type for the relational database.

nested_params.name: rdsHttpEndpointConfig
nested_params.description: Amazon RDS HTTP endpoint settings.

nested_params.name: awsRegion
nested_params.description: Amazon Web Services Region for Amazon RDS HTTP endpoint.

nested_params.name: dbClusterIdentifier
nested_params.description: Amazon RDS cluster Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_params.name: databaseName
nested_params.description: Logical database name.

nested_params.name: schema
nested_params.description: Logical schema name.

nested_params.name: awsSecretStoreArn
nested_params.description: Amazon Web Services secret store Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for database credentials.

parameters.name: eventBridgeConfig
parameters.description: Amazon EventBridge settings. The ARN of the event bus. For more information about event buses, see Amazon EventBridge event buses.

nested_params.name: eventBusArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the event bus. For more information about event buses, see Amazon EventBridge event buses.

parameters.name: metricsConfig
parameters.description: Enables or disables enhanced data source metrics for specified data sources. Note that metricsConfig won't be used unless the dataSourceLevelMetricsBehavior value is set to PER_DATA_SOURCE_METRICS. If the dataSourceLevelMetricsBehavior is set to FULL_REQUEST_DATA_SOURCE_METRICS instead, metricsConfig will be ignored. However, you can still set its value. metricsConfig can be ENABLED or DISABLED.
